scripts.lint: npm run lint:md && npm run lint:py
scripts.lint:py: cd .. && python -m ruff check bend/ tests/
scripts.lint:py:fix: cd .. && python -m ruff check --fix bend/ tests/
scripts.format: npm run format:md && npm run format:py
scripts.format:py: cd .. && python -m black bend/ tests/ && python -m ruff check --fix bend/ tests/
